mutator.name: Argument Propagation Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: Alive Mutant: A return value has been replaced by a method argument without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Conditionals Boundary Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A relational operator has been replaced by a boundary counterpart without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Constructor Call Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A constructor call has been removed without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Increments Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A local variable increment/decrement has been replaced without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Inline Constant Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: An inline constant has been changed without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Invert Negs Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A number has been replaced by its opposite without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Math Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A binary arithmetic operation has been replaced by another one without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Negate Conditionals Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A conditional expression has been negated without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Non Void Method Call Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A method call has been removed without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Remove Conditional Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A condition has been removed without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Return Vals Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: The return value of a method call has been replaced without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Void Method Call Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A method call has been removed without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Member Variable Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A member variable assignment has been replaced without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Remove Increments Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: An increment operation has been removed without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Remove Switch Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A switch statement has been replaced with the default label without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Return Values Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A return value has been replaced without being detected by a test.

mutator.name: Switch Mutator
mutator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: The default label has been replaced without being detected by a test.
